analysis.description:
castrol.startDate (/unique_chucks/11/0xbd677963d9bc990ee8fb7de06e1a63bf6850c2d1.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/11/0xbd677963d9bc990ee8fb7de06e1a63bf6850c2d1.sol#221-233)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/11/0xbd677963d9bc990ee8fb7de06e1a63bf6850c2d1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/11/0xbd677963d9bc990ee8fb7de06e1a63bf6850c2d1.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/11/0xbd677963d9bc990ee8fb7de06e1a63bf6850c2d1.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
